basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Ben Bagley, a web developer and designer from the UK. I like to combine my love of design with functional code. I'm passionate about learning new technologies and creating new things. Currently looking for a new role, so if you think I'd be a good fit for your team, please get in touch.

projects.title: Saltwells Brewery
projects.description: Saltwells Brewery is a personal project I created for a conceptual local brewery. I designed the logo and branding in Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop using local heritage as inspiration for the overall beer design.

projects.title: Blankly: Wireframing an App
projects.description: Blankly is a personal project I created for CalArts Coursera UI/UX course whilst learning the fundementals of wireframing an app. I used Adobe XD to create the wireframes and prototype. Logo and branding in was completed in Adobe Illustrator.

projects.title: Logo Designs
projects.description: I have created a number of logos for clients and personal projects. From sketching initial concepts, to brainstorming and then vectorising in Adobe Illustrator using a grid. The final logo is then exported in a variety of formats for use in print and digital media.
